name: Last Night A Nurse Save My Life
name_original: Last Night A Nurse Save My Life
description:
I'm a music producer and sound engineer, and I'm trying to learn pixel art and video game development. I started a month ago to inform myself and read about programming and to practice with Godot, and this is my first game. There are still some things to adjust but you can play. I hope you like it.

Known Bugs

-windows build needs to be tested. will be available as soon as posible.

-SCORE system needs to be fixed.

I'm sorry about the bugs, it's my first game, and i've done it to Learn.

All feedbacks and suggestions are welcome.
